Desc.entry: Run by Chilypep, a registered charity (see separate entry). The council is comprised of a group of young people from different areas, groups, backgrounds and abilities. The council brings together young people's voices, views and opinions to influence political activites and help to bring about improvement and change to Sheffield. Provides the opportunity for young people to get involved in issues that affect them and the chance to make a positive contribution to their communities. Within the council there are separate action groups that focus on specific issues such as; bullying, mental health, crime, skills for independence etc. which then feed their findings back to the council. Anyone aged 11-21 years (or 25 years for people with a disability) is welcome to join the council. A registered charity.
